pageContext.claim: “I also want to thank Acting Secretary of Defense Patrick Shanahan, who is with us; Secretary of the Air Force Heather Wilson; Vice Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, General Paul Selva; and the Executive Secretary of the Space Council, Dr. Scott Pace for being here today. They've all worked very hard on the Space Force. They all believe in it very strongly, as I do.”
pageContext.analysis: Secretary of the Air Force Heather Wilson was opposed to the creation of the Space Force, saying in June 2017: “The Pentagon is complicated enough. We're trying to simplify. This will make it more complex, add more boxes to the organization chart and cost more money. If I had more money, I would put it into lethality, not bureaucracy.”
